channel.title: Simplex Hyperion 474
channel.description: There is a snippet in (I think) ActionSender that is to do with looting chests and crates. It adds each chest/crate searched to a list so you can't search the same one over and over. I need the download, or at the very least just this snippet because I can't for the life of me remember how it was done.

item.title: Simplex Hyperion 474
item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

There is a snippet in (I think) ActionSender that is to do with looting chests and crates. It adds each chest/crate searched to a list so you can’t search the same one over and over. I need the download, or at the very least just this snippet because I can’t for the life of me remember how it was done.
